title: Ink UI keyboard input not working - cannot exit with 'q'
description:
The React Ink UI displays 'Press q to quit' but keyboard input doesn't work. User cannot exit the Ink screen without killing the terminal.

Likely causes:
1. useInput hook not receiving events in non-TTY context
2. Raw mode not being enabled properly
3. Ink render blocking the main process
4. Need to check isRawModeSupported logic

acceptanceCriteria.text: Debug why useInput hook doesn't receive keyboard events
Check if raw mode is properly enabled for stdin
Test: Press 'q' exits the Ink UI cleanly
Test: Ctrl+C also exits the Ink UI
Run CodeRabbit review - must pass (or create BUG if unfixable)
Commit: fix: BUG-024 enable keyboard input in Ink UI
